casebody.data:
Second Depabtmbnt,

Febbttaby, 1969.

(February 3, 1969) In the Matter of Thomas F. Gordon, an Attorney, Respondent. Brooklyn Bar Association, Petitioner.

Motion by petitioner to amend the decision [30 A D 2d 807] and order of this court, both dated July 1, 1968, as amended by order of this court dated August 21,1968, so as to change the effective date of respondent’s one-year suspension from the practice of law. Motion denied. Christ, Acting P. J., Brennan, Rabin, Hopkins and Munder, JJ., concur.
